The Sweet Hereafter

Ano: 1997

IMDb ID: tt0120255

Classificação: 7.4

Sinopse: A small community is torn apart by a tragic accident which kills most of the town's children. A lawyer visits the victims' parents in order to profit from the tragedy by stirring up their anger and launching a class action suit against anyone they can blame. The community is paralyzed by its anger and cannot let go. All but one young girl, left in a wheelchair after the accident, who finds the courage to lead the way toward healing.—Matthew Tichenor
